title: Julius Caesar: an introduction
creator_contributor_role: Educational Foundation for Visual Aids, production company
subject_group: Literature/English literature - Film and video adaptations
Literature/Shakespeare, William, 1564-1616 - Film and video adaptations
Education, Instruction, Teaching & Schools/Drama - Study and teaching
Education, Instruction, Teaching & Schools/Literature - Study and teaching
Music & Performing Arts/Drama - Study and teaching
description: A talented English company performs key scenes in this abbreviated version which, however, preserves the sense of tragedy of the full-length drama. Brief narrative bridges connect the scenes, which offers the first-time reader an opportunity to acquire a grasp of the main themes and action, and enrich his understanding and appreciation of the play.
